public abstract class BaseSetOperateOnSelectedItemsAction
extends RhnSetAction

BaseSetOperateOnSelectedItemsAction - extension of RhnSetAction that provides a framework for performing a specified business operation on the currently selected items in the list.

public ActionForward operateOnSelectedSet(ActionMapping mapping,
                                          ActionForm formIn,
                                          HttpServletRequest request,
                                          HttpServletResponse response,
                                          java.lang.String callbackMethodName)
Execute some operation on the set of selected items. Forwards to the "default" NOTE: Must define StringResource for failure and success messages: getSetName() + ".success" for providing a parameterized getSetName() + ".failure" for providing a parameterized message to the UI that would say "2 ServerProbe Suite(s) deleted."

Parameters:
mapping - ActionMapping
formIn - ActionForm
request - ServletRequest
response - ServletResponse
callbackMethodName - Name of the call back method.
Returns:
The ActionForward to go to next.

handleEmptySelection

protected ActionForward handleEmptySelection(ActionMapping mapping,
                                             ActionForm formIn,
                                             HttpServletRequest request)
This method is to be called when the rhnsetis empty i.e no checked boxes were selected... This method basically sets up the error message and returns the correct action forward.

request - ServletRequest

This basically adds all the action messages that will be used for validation errors or status messages

Parameters:
msgs - container of the messages
methodName - name of the caller method which is used as a key
successCount - the number of successful actions
failureCount - the number of failures.
